title: PB&J
desc:
Post 1308
- When determining the cards this can be played on, ignore the <:food:1115785297721032786> color.
- When eaten, all other players draw a <:red:1106234051129507932> or <:purple:1106247148607131711> card, depending on if this card is <:red:1106234051129507932> or <:purple:1106247148607131711>.
